text: Everything Everywhere All at Once is an upcoming American science fiction film directed by Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert. It stars Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, James Hong, Jonathan Ke Quan and Jamie Lee Curtis. ==Cast== *Michelle Yeoh *Stephanie Hsu *James Hong *Jonathan Ke Quan *Jamie Lee Curtis ==Production== It was announced in August 2018 that Michelle Yeoh and Awkwafina were cast to star in an “interdimensional action film” from Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert, with Anthony and Joe Russo set to produce.Michelle Yeoh, Awkwafina in Talks for Film From 'Swiss Army Man' Directors The film received a tax credit in March 2019 to film in California.Leonardo DiCaprio EP’d ‘Akira’ Scores In Latest California Tax Credits Allocation Kwan and Scheinert stated in September that they were still waiting for a greenlight for the film.‘Swiss Army Man’ Directors Passed on ‘Deadpool 2’ to Make a Sci- Fi Movie With Michelle Yeoh Awkwafina exited the project prior to filming starting in January 2020 in Los Angeles. Stephanie Hsu, James Hong, Jonathan Ke Quan and Jamie Lee Curtis were added to the cast with Hsu replacing Awkwafina. A24 acquired the distribution rights to the film.A24 Reunites With ‘Swiss Army Man’ Directors; Finance & Distribute AGBO’s ‘Everything Everywhere All At Once’ ==References== ==External links== * Category:Upcoming films Category:American films Category:American science fiction films Category:Films shot in Los Angeles Category:A24 films Category:Films produced by Scott Rudin
title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
